struct Vector3(PRECISION);

3 dimentional column-major Vector class. OpenGL style. \htmlonly 

        | x |
    V = | y |
        | z |
\endhtmlonly

struct Polar3(PRECISION);

3 component polar class

Quaternion!(PRECISION) interpolateLinear(PRECISION)(ref const(Quaternion!(PRECISION)) a, PRECISION t, ref const(Quaternion!(PRECISION)) b);

\param a, b normalized quaternion. \param t [ 0 .. 1 ]

Example:

struct Matrix4(PRECISION);

4x4 column-major matrix. \htmlonly 

        | 11, 21, 31, 41 |   | 0,  4,  8,  12 |
    M = | 12, 22, 32, 42 | = | 1,  5,  9,  13 |
        | 13, 23, 33, 43 |   | 2,  6,  10, 14 |
        | 14, 24, 34, 44 |   | 3,  7,  11, 15 |
\endhtmlonly

M[1] == M[0,1] == M.12;
